intro: Epidendrum aculeatum, commonly known as the spiked epidendrum, is a tropical orchid native to Central and South America. It is characterized by its upright growth habit and long, arching inflorescences that bear clusters of fragrant, white to pale yellow flowers. The plant typically grows on trees or rocks, exhibiting an epiphytic lifestyle.
